name: Bored Ape Token
description: BapeToken is an innovative BEP20 meme token inspired by the ‘Bored Apes’ NFTs of the Metaverse. BapeToken with its smart contract runs on the Binance (BSC) blockchain and is fully audited and verified. The dev team is fully doxed and has been KYC verified. Using our innovative tokenomics we are focussed on the Web 3.0 revolution of the internet and its token based ecosystem, with aspirations to collaborate with gaming platforms and social media as a token based digital currency
